TopicTitle: Fun IOS Game like KSP, Space Agency!

Articles.Content: So I found this game called Space Agency for 2 or 3 dollars on my iPod because I just got a 25$ iTunes gift card. It's very different to SimpleRocket(which I also got) It allows you launch using real life launch stages and they have a reentry heat system with docking and a launch counter with the sparks it's just amazing! So if you want a game like KSP for IOS device there ya go!
I've had it for a while, and it is pretty fun. There are a few things that need improving, and I would like it if they had a sandbox mode with all the parts unlocked.

I hate Space Agency. It's not nearly as awesome as KSP or even another game, Simple Rockets, for the iOS devices and Android. It's missions make no sense, it's unrealistic, and it is not close to a sandbox of any kind, it's not open ended at all. Simple Rockets is different. check it out.
Hah, I got space agency for free on Android. I do think its more developed than SimpleRockets, but it is still quite unrealistic.
The orbital mechanics are questionable, to say the least. Building rockets is fun, though, especially replicating real ones or thinking along the lines of "This is what could have been"
